Html:
Hello all,

last week I published the latest Adobe Flash Player ActiveX 12.0.0.38 from catalog.
Clientside this update shows up as needed update day by day although it is already installed.

Someone else notice this issue with Adobe Flash Player ActiveX 12.0.0.38?

Greetings
Helmut

Hi Helmut, I have published these updates at work today (not using the catalog) and at home using catalog, without any problem.
I can remember that some day ago Adobe have publish/delete/publish/delete/publish... a catalog for Flash Player or Adobe Reader (I can't remember). I have suppose at this moment that they have been some problem with this catalog. May be this time it happen again.
Try to download again the catalog.
Thx for your answer Dcourtel, that solved the problem!
You can find more information on this : Here
